      • updateHistory

        public static Boolean updateHistory(Process inProcess)
                             throws IOException,
                                    DataException
        Update the history if necessary. It means: - count storage difference in byte
        - count imagesWork difference
        - count imagesMaster difference
        - count metadata difference
        - count docstruct difference
        Parameters:
        inProcess - the Process to use
        Returns:
        true, if any history event is updated, so the process has to be saved to database
        Throws:
        IOException
        DataException

        Returns:
